sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment ,useState, useEffect,useRef} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const QuotationPrint=()=>{ let [data,changeData]=useState( {customer:'',date:'',t_disc_amount:0,t_disc_perc:0,remarks:'',attention:'',quotation_valid:'',total:0,net_amount:0,quotation_details:[{id:0,productname:'',subtotal:0,unit:0,qty:0,rate:0}]}); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:3010/quotation/last-quotation').then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data); changeData(res.data.reduce(l=>l)); }) },[]) return(

Quotation

Quotation Ref : SMS/

Date: {data.date}

Company : {data.staff.name} {data.staff}

Attention :

< div class="col-6">

Designation :

Tel : asdnasd

Email:

Subject :

Dear Sir,

Reference to above inquiry,we are pleased to quote you the best competitive price as under.

{ data.quotation_details.map(list=>{ return( ) })}
Sr# Description Unit Rate Quantity Total
{list.id} {list.productname} {list.unit} {list.rate} {list.qty} {list.subtotal}
Total Rs 10000
Discount
Net Total

Remarks :





Manager _____________________

 ) } export default QuotationPrint;
